mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT(id) FROM f_project WHERE uid IN (SELECT uid FROM f_user_customer WHERE fid=(SELECT fid FROM f_user_customer WHERE uid=#{uid}))

SELECT t1.id,t1.name,count(t3.id) as meshNum,t2.account as account,DATE_FORMAT(t1.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS create_date,DATE_FORMAT(t1.update_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS update_date FROM (SELECT * FROM f_project p WHERE p.name=IFNULL(NULLIF(#{name},''),p.name) and p.create_date BETWEEN IFNULL(NULLIF(#{startCreateDate},''),p.create_date) and IFNULL(NULLIF(#{endCreateDate},''),p.create_date) and p.update_date BETWEEN IFNULL(NULLIF(#{startUpdateDate},''),p.update_date) and IFNULL(NULLIF(#{endUpdateDate},''),p.update_date)) AS t1 INNER JOIN f_user_account AS t2 ON t1.uid = t2.id INNER JOIN f_mesh AS t3 ON t1.id = t3.project_id GROUP BY t3.project_id ORDER BY t1.update_date DESC, t1.create_date DESC
